snp3.7:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā aṅguttarāpesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi yena āpaṇaṁ nāma aṅguttarāpānaṁ nigamo tadavasari.
snp3.7:1.4_1: gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito aṅguttarāpesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi āpaṇaṁ anuppatto.
snp3.7:1.5_0: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
snp3.7:1.6_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
snp3.7:1.7_0: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
snp3.7:1.8_0: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
snp3.7:1.9_0: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṁ arahataṁ dassanaṁ hotī”ti.
snp3.7:2.1_0: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
snp3.7:2.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
snp3.7:2.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho keṇiyaṁ jaṭilaṁ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
snp3.7:2.4_0: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.7:2.5_0: “adhivāsetu me bhavaṁ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
snp3.7:2.6_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā keṇiyaṁ jaṭilaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.7:3.1_0: Dutiyampi kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.7:3.3_0: adhivāsetu me bhavaṁ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
snp3.7:3.4_0: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā keṇiyaṁ jaṭilaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.7:4.1_0: Tatiyampi kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.7:4.3_0: adhivāsetu me bhavaṁ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
snp3.7:4.5_0: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena sako assamo tenupasaṅkami;
snp3.7:4.7_0: samaṇo me gotamo nimantito svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena,
snp3.7:4.9_1: bho”ti kho keṇiyassa jaṭilassa mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā keṇiyassa jaṭilassa paṭissutvā appekacce uddhanāni khaṇanti, appekacce kaṭṭhāni phālenti,
snp3.7:4.9_3: appekacce udakamaṇikaṁ patiṭṭhāpenti, appekacce āsanāni paññāpenti.
snp3.7:4.10_0: Keṇiyo pana jaṭilo sāmaṁyeva maṇḍalamāḷaṁ paṭiyādeti.
snp3.7:5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena selo brāhmaṇo āpaṇe paṭivasati,
snp3.7:5.1_1: tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṁ sākkharappabhedānaṁ itihāsapañcamānaṁ padako veyyākaraṇo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo,
snp3.7:6.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena keṇiyo jaṭilo sele brāhmaṇe abhippasanno hoti.
snp3.7:6.2_0: Atha kho selo brāhmaṇo tīhi māṇavakasatehi parivuto jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno yena keṇiyassa jaṭilassa assamo tenupasaṅkami.
snp3.7:6.3_0: Addasā kho selo brāhmaṇo keṇiyassa jaṭilassa assame appekacce uddhanāni khaṇante …pe… appekacce āsanāni paññapente,
snp3.7:6.3_1: keṇiyaṁ pana jaṭilaṁ sāmaṁyeva maṇḍalamāḷaṁ paṭiyādentaṁ.
snp3.7:6.5_0: “kiṁ nu kho bhoto keṇiyassa āvāho vā bhavissati, vivāho vā bhavissati, mahāyañño vā paccupaṭṭhito,
snp3.7:6.5_1: rājā vā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro nimantito svātanāya saddhiṁ balakāyenā”ti?
snp3.7:7.1_2: nāpi rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro nimantito svātanāya saddhiṁ balakāyena;
snp3.7:7.2_0: api ca kho me mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito.
snp3.7:7.3_0: Atthi samaṇo gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito aṅguttarāpesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi āpaṇaṁ anuppatto.
snp3.7:7.6_0: So me nimantito svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
snp3.7:8.2_0: “ghosopi kho eso dullabho lokasmiṁ, yadidaṁ buddhoti.
snp3.7:8.3_1: yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti anaññā.
snp3.7:8.4_0: Sace agāraṁ ajjhāvasati rājā hoti cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā cāturanto vijitāvī janapadatthāvariyappatto sattaratanasamannāgato.
snp3.7:8.6_0: cakkaratanaṁ, hatthiratanaṁ, assaratanaṁ, maṇiratanaṁ, itthiratanaṁ, gahapatiratanaṁ,
snp3.7:8.7_0: Parosahassaṁ kho panassa puttā bhavanti sūrā vīraṅgarūpā parasenappamaddanā.
snp3.7:8.8_0: So imaṁ pathaviṁ sāgarapariyantaṁ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhāvasati.
snp3.7:8.9_0: Sace kho pana agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati,
snp3.7:8.10_1: etarahi so bhavaṁ gotamo viharati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho”ti?
snp3.7:9.1_1: keṇiyo jaṭilo dakkhiṇaṁ bāhuṁ paggahetvā selaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.7:9.3_0: Atha kho selo brāhmaṇo tīhi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
snp3.7:9.4_0: Atha kho selo brāhmaṇo te māṇavake āmantesi:
snp3.7:9.6_0: Durāsadā hi te bhagavanto sīhāva ekacarā.
snp3.7:9.7_2: mā me bhonto antarantarā kathaṁ opātetha;
snp3.7:10.1_0: Atha kho selo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
snp3.7:10.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
snp3.7:10.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho selo brāhmaṇo bhagavato kāye dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni samannesi.
snp3.7:10.4_0: Addasā kho selo brāhmaṇo bhagavato kāye dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni yebhuyyena ṭhapetvā dve.
snp3.7:10.5_0: Dvīsu mahāpurisalakkhaṇesu kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati—
snp3.7:11.2_0: “passati kho me ayaṁ selo brāhmaṇo dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni yebhuyyena ṭhapetvā dve.
snp3.7:11.3_0: Dvīsu mahāpurisalakkhaṇesu kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati—
snp3.7:11.5_0: Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsi,
snp3.7:11.5_1: yathā addasa selo brāhmaṇo bhagavato kosohitaṁ vatthaguyhaṁ.
snp3.7:11.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā jivhaṁ ninnāmetvā ubhopi kaṇṇasotāni anumasi paṭimasi,
snp3.7:12.2_0: “samannāgato kho samaṇo gotamo dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi paripuṇṇehi, no aparipuṇṇehi.
snp3.7:12.3_0: No ca kho naṁ jānāmi buddho vā no vā.
snp3.7:12.4_0: Sutaṁ kho pana metaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ vuḍḍhānaṁ mahallakānaṁ ācariyapācariyānaṁ bhāsamānānaṁ:
snp3.7:12.5_1: te sake vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attānaṁ pātukarontī’ti.
snp3.7:12.6_0: Yannūnāhaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthaveyyan”ti.
snp3.7:12.7_0: Atha kho selo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi:
snp3.7:33.1_0: Alattha kho selo brāhmaṇo sapariso bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, alattha upasampadaṁ.
snp3.7:33.2_0: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena sake assame paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṁ ārocāpesi:
snp3.7:33.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena keṇiyassa jaṭilassa assamo tenupasaṅkami;
snp3.7:33.4_1: upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.
snp3.7:34.1_0: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
snp3.7:34.2_0: Atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo bhagavantaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ aññataraṁ nīcaṁ āsanaṁ gahetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
snp3.7:34.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho keṇiyaṁ jaṭilaṁ bhagavā imāhi gāthāhi anumodi:
snp3.7:37.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā keṇiyaṁ jaṭilaṁ imāhi gāthāhi anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
snp3.7:37.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā selo sapariso eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva …pe…
snp3.7:37.3_0: aññataro kho panāyasmā selo sapariso arahataṁ ahosi.
snp3.7:38.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā selo sapariso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
snp3.7:38.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ cīvaraṁ katvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
